about_the_game:
The Search Soundtrack features 5 music tracks in MP3 format.

Track Listing:
1. The Threshold (0:39) - Jason Godbey
2. Ouendake (3:32) - Goldmund (Keith Kenniff)
3. Unseen Forces At Work (2:55) - Jewelbeat
4. Web Of Deceit (2:06) - Jewelbeat
5. The Search (2:09) - Jewelbeat


Files will be downloaded as a zip called "The Search Soundtrack" and will go into your Steam directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\The Search
